articles.caption: A look at Legal & Regulatory Considerations in Web3 Gaming by @naavik_co
articles.title: Legal & Regulatory Considerations in Web3 Gaming (Part 1) ‚Äî Naavik
articles.description:
The largest pain point for blockchain gaming is regulatory uncertainty. Not 
only do existing issues such as IP, consumer protection, and gambling 
applicable to traditional games remain in effect, but web3 games have 
additional challenges around convertible virtual currencies: NFTs, money 
transmission, and securities laws. In the first part of a two part series, 
investor Amy Madison explores the legal risks of Money Transmitters and 
Convertible Virtual Currencies.
